AT.name: Mega Man™ 3
AT.description: Hat Mega Mans Erzfeind Dr. Wily sich letztendlich geändert? Nur die Zukunft wird es zeigen, da sich Mega Man um eine neue Bedrohung kümmern muss: Acht hinterhältige Superroboter halten sich in acht neuen Leveln versteckt, die geniales Jump’n’Shoot-Gameplay bieten. Dieser NES™-Klassiker erweiterte das beliebte Spielkonzept um zwei bahnbrechende Features. Mega Man kann nun nicht nur rennen, sondern auch rutschen, was ihn agiler als je zuvor macht. Er hat auch einen neuen Gefährten: Rush, der Roboterhund, bringt neue Fähigkeiten wie einen Jet oder ein U-Boot mit und unterstützt Mega Man auf seiner Mission.

AU.name: Mega Man™ 3
AU.description: Has Mega Man’s nemesis Dr Wily finally changed his ways? Only time will tell, as Mega Man must deal with a new threat: eight fiendish robot masters lurking in eight new challenging stages of platform-shooter perfection! This NES™ classic expanded upon the hit formula with two game-changing additions. Mega Man can now slide as well as run; giving him unprecedented manoeuvrability. He also has a new sidekick, Rush the robot dog, who brings new abilities, like a jet or submarine, aiding Mega Man in his mission.

FI.name: Mega Man™ 3
FI.description: Has Mega Man’s nemesis Dr Wily finally changed his ways? Only time will tell, as Mega Man must deal with a new threat: eight fiendish robot masters lurking in eight new challenging stages of platform-shooter perfection! This NES™ classic expanded upon the hit formula with two game-changing additions. Mega Man can now slide as well as run; giving him unprecedented manoeuvrability. He also has a new sidekick, Rush the robot dog, who brings new abilities, like a jet or submarine, aiding Mega Man in his mission.

FR.name: Mega Man™ 3
FR.description: Le Dr. Wily, l'ennemi juré de Mega Man, a-t-il changé ? Seul le temps le dira. En attendant, Mega Man doit gérer une nouvelle menace : huit robots surpuissants dans huit stages d'action à couper le souffle ! Ce grand classique de la NES™ renouvelle la série avec deux nouveautés : Mega Man peut maintenant courir et glisser pour atteindre les lieux les plus inaccessibles. Il a aussi un nouvel allié, Rush le chien-robot, qui peut se transformer en plateforme volante ou en sous-marin pour l'aider dans sa mission.

GR.name: Mega Man™ 3
GR.description: Has Mega Man’s nemesis Dr Wily finally changed his ways? Only time will tell, as Mega Man must deal with a new threat: eight fiendish robot masters lurking in eight new challenging stages of platform-shooter perfection! This NES™ classic expanded upon the hit formula with two game-changing additions. Mega Man can now slide as well as run; giving him unprecedented manoeuvrability. He also has a new sidekick, Rush the robot dog, who brings new abilities, like a jet or submarine, aiding Mega Man in his mission.

ES.name: Mega Man™ 3
ES.description: ¿Será cierto que el Dr. Wily, el archienemigo de Mega Man, ha cambiado? ¡Solo el tiempo lo dirá! Mientras, Mega Man tendrá que lidiar con una nueva amenaza: ¡ocho diabólicos robots jefe acechan en ocho nuevos y desafiantes niveles en los que se combinan a la perfección disparos y plataformas! Este clásico de NES™ desarrolla la fórmula de la serie y añade dos novedades; ¡ahora Mega Man puede deslizarse y correr, lo que le otorga una capacidad de maniobra sin precedentes! Además, también contará con un ayudante, Rush el perro robot, que podrá transformarse en reactor o submarino y será de gran ayuda a Mega Man en su misión.

This NES™ classic expanded upon the hit formula with two game-changing additions. Mega Man can now slide as well as run; giving him unprecedented manoeuvrability. IT.name: Mega Man™ 3
IT.description: Sarà vero che il Dr. Wily, nemesi di Mega Man, ha abbandonato i suoi propositi malvagi? Solo il tempo potrà dircelo... Intanto, Mega Man deve affrontare una nuova minaccia: otto terribili Robot Master si nascondono in altrettanti nuovi e avvincenti livelli, in cui l'azione degli sparatutto e l'adrenalina dei platform si fondono in maniera perfetta! Questo classico per NES™ sviluppa ulteriormente la formula della serie con due nuove aggiunte: Mega Man è ora in grado di correre ed effettuare scivolate, dimostrando un'agilità senza precedenti. Inoltre, il nostro eroe ha ora un nuovo alleato: Rush, un cane robot in grado di trasformarsi in jet o sottomarino e di assistere Mega Man in qualsiasi occasione!

This NES™ classic expanded upon the hit formula with two game-changing additions. Mega Man can now slide as well as run; giving him unprecedented manoeuvrability. NL.name: Mega Man™ 3
NL.description: Staat Mega Mans aartsvijand Dr. Wily eindelijk aan de goede kant? De tijd zal het leren, want Mega Man krijgt te maken met een nieuwe bedreiging: acht dekselse Robot Masters die op de loer liggen in acht nieuwe uitdagende levels vol platform- en shooteractie! Deze NES™-klassieker breidt de succesformule uit met twee toevoegingen die het spel flink veranderen. Mega Man kan nu zowel glijden als rennen, waardoor hij een ongekende wendbaarheid krijgt. Hij heeft ook een nieuwe partner: de robothond Rush die met nieuwe functies als een straaljager of een onderzeeër Mega Man te hulp schiet in zijn missie.

LU.name: Mega Man™ 3
LU.description: Le Dr. Wily, l'ennemi juré de Mega Man, a-t-il changé ? Seul le temps le dira. En attendant, Mega Man doit gérer une nouvelle menace : huit robots surpuissants dans huit stages d'action à couper le souffle ! Ce grand classique de la NES™ renouvelle la série avec deux nouveautés : Mega Man peut maintenant courir et glisser pour atteindre les lieux les plus inaccessibles. Il a aussi un nouvel allié, Rush le chien-robot, qui peut se transformer en plateforme volante ou en sous-marin pour l'aider dans sa mission.

SE.description: Has Mega Man’s nemesis Dr Wily finally changed his ways? Only time will tell, as Mega Man must deal with a new threat: eight fiendish robot masters lurking in eight new challenging stages of platform-shooter perfection! This NES™ classic expanded upon the hit formula with two game-changing additions. Mega Man can now slide as well as run; giving him unprecedented manoeuvrability. He also has a new sidekick, Rush the robot dog, who brings new abilities, like a jet or submarine, aiding Mega Man in his mission.

RU.name: Mega Man™ 3
RU.description: Неужели старый враг спасителя мира Mega Man Dr. Wily перешел на сторону добра? Время покажет. А тем временем у Mega Man возникла очередная проблема: взбунтовавшиеся robot masters. Чтобы победить их, герою предстоит пройти восемь захватывающих уровней нового платформера-шутера! В классической игре для NES™ появилось два важных изменения. Теперь Mega Man может не только бегать, но и скользить, что придает ему большую маневренность. Также у главного героя появился новый спутник: собака-робот по кличке Rush. Благодаря ее способностям Mega Man может летать и путешествовать под водой.

PL.name: Mega Man™ 3
PL.description: Has Mega Man’s nemesis Dr Wily finally changed his ways? Only time will tell, as Mega Man must deal with a new threat: eight fiendish robot masters lurking in eight new challenging stages of platform-shooter perfection! This NES™ classic expanded upon the hit formula with two game-changing additions. Mega Man can now slide as well as run; giving him unprecedented manoeuvrability. He also has a new sidekick, Rush the robot dog, who brings new abilities, like a jet or submarine, aiding Mega Man in his mission.

PT.name: Mega Man™ 3
PT.description: Será que o grande rival de Mega Man, Dr. Wily, finalmente mudou de ideias? Apenas o tempo o dirá, pois Mega Man tem de enfrentar uma nova ameaça: oito diabólicos Robot Masters que se escondem em oito novos e desafiantes níveis neste shooter de plataformas perfeito! Este clássico NES™ foi desenvolvido a partir da fórmula de sucesso e apresenta duas novidades. Agora Mega Man pode deslizar e correr, conseguindo uma manobrabilidade nunca antes vista. O protagonista tem também um novo companheiro: Rush, o cão robótico, que traz novas capacidades, como um jato ou um submarino, ajudando Mega Man na sua missão.
